segments.text: Have you seen the tower in front of us . That's the famous Eiffel Tower . It was built in 1889 for the World's Fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It stands 320m ( 1050ft ) high and held the record as the world's tallest structure until 1930 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have heard its name is connected with someone , is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the towel was named after its designer Gustave Eiffel .
segments.speaker: S1
